name: ZAMBI 2 KIL
description:
ZAMBI 2 KIL is a quality game about, you guessed it! Killing zombies, and only that. So yeah, that's it! 'cuz everyone just loves zombies [citation needed]. Get it and go kill all the zombies. Who doesn't enjoy killing zombies one after another with NOTHING else to do? You really want to play ZAMBI 2 KIL right NOW because:
  • One - Iz cheap so why the hell not!
  • Two - Haz ZAMBIZ and nothing else!
  • Three - Zambiz are awesome!
  • Four - You already killed all the zombies in a million other games!
  • Five - Yeah...

Here are the awesome features of ZAMBI 2 KIL:
  • Walking simulator, you walk around to find zombies.
  • One type of enemy, you only attack and kill zombies.
  • Turn-based battle, you and zombies each get your own turn in fights.
